short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build a Marvel SNAP deck, lookup game info (card, location, bot) and find out what's new every season straight from any browser tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- deck builder
- character, location, bot search
- season calendar, timer & more!
- offline functionality
- lightweight (< 1 MB size)
- no extra permissions required
